title: GNU binutils 2.28 BFD Library bfd/aoutx.h aout_link_add_symbols 拒绝服务漏洞
description:
GNU Binutils（又名GNU Binary Utilities或binutils）是GNU计划开发的一组编程语言工具程序，它主要用于处理多种格式的目标文件，并提供有连接器、汇编器和其他用于目标文件和档案的工具。Binary File Descriptor（BFD）library（又名libbfd）是其中的一个以各种格式便携式操作对象文件的库。

GNU Binutils 2.28版本中的BFD库的bfd/aoutx.h文件的‘aout_link_add_symbols’函数存在安全漏洞。攻击者可利用该漏洞造成GNU linker(ld)程序崩溃。
solution:
目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载：
http://www.gnu.org
https://sourceware.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=20909

title: Linux kernel 'llc'子系统内存信息泄露漏洞
description:
Linux kernel是一款开源的操作系统。

Linux kernel llc子系统net/llc/af_llc.c llc_ui_recvmsg函数处理流套接字代码没有更新msg_namelen成员为0，可导致net/socket.c把本地未初始化sockaddr_storage变量信息泄露给用户空间，可导致敏感信息泄露。

另外在接收过程中关闭套接字的情况下也没有对数据报套接字的msg_namelen进行更新。
solution:
用户可参考如下GIT库中提供的安全补丁：
http://git.kernel.org/cgit/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=c77a4b9cffb6215a15196ec499490d116dfad181

title: Apache Tomcat 'MemoryUserDatabase'信息泄露漏洞
description: Apache Tomcat是一款开放源码的JSP应用服务器程序。通过JMX使用MemoryUserDatabase(基于tomcat-users.xml)和创建用户时，在用户创建过程中的一个异常可在JMX客户端错误一个错误消息，这个错误消息可包含用户密码。此错误消息也会写入到Tomcat日志中。用户密码对拥有JMX访问的管理员或可对tomcat-users.xml文件读访问的管理员可见。没有这些权限的用户可通过读取日志文件获得密码信息。
solution: 用户可参考如下供应商提供的安全公告获得补丁信息：http://tomcat.apache.org/security-7.html#Fixed_in_Apache_Tomcat_7.0.17_%28not_yet_released%29http://tomcat.apache.org/security-6.html#Fixed_in_Apache_Tomcat_6.0.33_%28not_yet_released%29http://tomcat.apache.org/security-5.html#Fixed_in_Apache_Tomcat_5.5.34_%28not_yet_released%29

title: NetIQ Access Manager跨站请求伪造漏洞
description:
NetIQ Access Manager（NAM）是美国NetIQ公司开发的一套资源访问解控制决方案。该方案可对本地和远程用户提供多重身份认证、数据加密、单点登录和SSL VPN等功能。

NetIQ Access Manager存在跨站请求伪造漏洞，该漏洞产生的原因是未能对HTTP请求进行有效验证所致。攻击者可利用漏洞执行未授权操作、获取敏感信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新:
https://www.novell.com/support/kb/doc.php?id=7017817

title: bluespire aurelia-path 动态确定对象属性修改的控制不恰当
description: aurelia-path is part of the Aurelia platform and contains utilities for path manipulation. There is a prototype pollution vulnerability in aurelia-path before version 1.1.7. The vulnerability exposes Aurelia application that uses `aurelia-path` package to parse a string. The majority of this will be Aurelia applications that employ the `aurelia-router` package. An example is this could allow an attacker to change the prototype of base object class `Object` by tricking an application to parse the following URL: `https://aurelia.io/blog/?__proto__[asdf]=asdf`. The problem is patched in version `1.1.7`.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

iOS是由苹果公司为移动设备所开发的操作系统，支持的设备包括iPhone、iPod touch、iPad、Apple TV。

Apple iOS 9.3.5之前版本WebKit存在内存破坏漏洞，攻击者利用漏洞通过构造的网站，可执行任意代码或造成拒绝服务（内存破坏）。
solution:
厂商已经发布了升级补丁，请到厂商的主页下载：
https://support.apple.com/HT207107
http://lists.apple.com/archives/security-announce/2016/Aug/msg00000.html

title: Google Android Qualcomm sme驱动程序权限提升漏洞

title: cisco video_surveillance_8400_firmware 内存缓冲区边界内操作的限制不恰当
description: A vulnerability in the Cisco Discovery Protocol implementation for Cisco Video Surveillance 8000 Series IP Cameras could allow an unauthenticated, adjacent attacker to cause an affected IP camera to reload. This vulnerability is due to missing checks when processing Cisco Discovery Protocol messages. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a malicious Cisco Discovery Protocol packet to an affected IP camera. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to cause the affected IP camera to reload unexpectedly, resulting in a denial of service (DoS) condition. Note: Cisco Discovery Protocol is a Layer 2 protocol. To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker must be in the same broadcast domain as the affected device (Layer 2 adjacent).
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: google tensorflow 使用未经初始化的指针
description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. In affected versions an attacker can cause undefined behavior via binding a reference to null pointer in `tf.raw_ops.RaggedTensorToVariant`. The [implementation](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/460e000de3a83278fb00b61a16d161b1964f15f4/tensorflow/core/kernels/ragged_tensor_to_variant_op.cc#L129) has an incomplete validation of the splits values, missing the case when the argument would be empty. We have patched the issue in GitHub commit be7a4de6adfbd303ce08be4332554dff70362612. The fix will be included in TensorFlow 2.6.0. We will also cherrypick this commit on TensorFlow 2.5.1, TensorFlow 2.4.3, and TensorFlow 2.3.4, as these are also affected and still in supported range.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: Eclipse Che跨站请求伪造漏洞
description: Eclipse Che是Eclipse基金会的一套基于Java的开源在线集成开发环境（IDE）。在7.14.0之前的版本中，在Eclipse Che中发现了一个影响CodeReady工作区的漏洞。当配置cookies身份验证时，Theia IDE无法正确设置SameSite值，从而允许跨站点请求伪造（CSRF），从而允许跨站点WebSocket劫持。此漏洞允许攻击者通过/services端点获得对受害者工作区的完全访问权。为了执行成功的攻击，攻击者进行中间人攻击（MITM），并通过一个不可信的链接欺骗受害者执行请求，该链接执行CSRF和套接字劫持。此漏洞的最大威胁是机密性、完整性以及系统可用性。

description: A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before 1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SProcScreenSaverSuspend function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

cwe.cwe_description: 内存缓冲区边界内操作的限制不恰当
